opinions.text: Petition for Allowance of Appeal GRANTED, No. 57 W.D. Appeal Docket, 1986.

casebody.head_matter:
513 A.2d 390
Howard William POLING v. Ted HALLER, Individually and as Personal Representative of the Estate of Becky G. Neal, Heather Michelle Neal and Marion Haller, and State Workmen’s Insurance Fund, a/k/a State Worker’s Ins. Fund. Petition of Ted HALLER, Individually and as Personal Representative of the Estate of Becky G. Neal, Heather Michelle Neal and Marion Haller.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 7, 1986.
